name: Kensington SlimBlade Wireless Laser Mouse
Features: [Plug-and-stay nano receiver is so small you plug it in once, and never have to worry about it again, Laser sensor gives you precise control on more surfaces and extends battery life, Thin profile design fits in your hand as well as your travel bag, 4-way tilt scroll wheel, Laser sensor for tracking on more surfaces, On/off switch, Low-battery indicator]
